Key Match Events: The Minnesota Timberwolves won the game 108-106
Anthony Edwards finished the game with 37 points, eight assists, seven rebounds, and attempted 29 shots
Pre-Game Insights: Comparisons were made between Anthony Edwards and James Harden's early careers
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden spoke candidly about Anthony Edwards' role in the offense, saying he's aggressive, gets teammates open, and scores at a high level
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Clippers will look to regroup and capture a tough win on the road in Kawhi Leonard's third game back when they travel to face the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night
